Description: Concave lip sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery cup;, type C; tall lip, offset on interior; glazed black on interior and exterior; inscription cut on exterior.
Curator's comments: Cups type C are attested before 510BC in destruction levels at Sybaris, see E. Greco, 'Sullo σχῆμα di Thurii: venti anni di ricerche con Silvana Luppino', Annuario della Scuola archeologica di Atene e delle Missioni italiane in Oriente XCII (Serie III, 14) (2014) [2016], 1-11, esp. 5.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXII, no. 92)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 647, no. 54)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1450)
